data.1: I CALL TO witness those who scatter (dust) by dispersing,
data.2: And those who bear the load (of rain),
data.3: And those who move (on the water) gently,
data.4: And those who distribute (it) by command,
data.5: Verily the promise made to you is true:
data.6: The Judgement will indeed take place.
data.8: You are surely caught in contradictions.,
data.9: From which only he turns who is turned away.
data.10: Perish will those who just guess and speculate,
data.12: They ask: "When is the Day of Judgement?" --
data.13: The day they will be burnt in the Fire,
data.14: (And told:) "Taste your punishment. This is what you were trying to hasten."
data.15: Surely those who fear God and follow the straight path will be amidst gardens and fresh springs of water,
data.16: Receiving what is given them by their Lord. They were surely the virtuous before this.
data.17: They slept little in the night,
data.19: In whose wealth the suppliant and the deprived had a share.
data.20: There are signs in the earth for those who are firm in their faith,
data.21: And within yourselves. Can you not perceive?
data.22: There is in the heavens your sustenance, and whatever has been promised you.
data.23: By the Lord of the heavens and the earth, this is certainly true even as you speak.
data.24: Has the story of Abraham´s honoured guests come to you?
data.25: When they came to him, they said: "Peace." He answered: "Peace." They were a people he did not recognise.
data.26: So he hurried to the house and brought a fatted calf,
data.27: And placing it before them said: "Won´t you eat?"
data.28: He felt afraid of them; but they said: "Have no fear," and gave him the good news of a wise son.
data.29: His wife came out lamenting, striking her forehead, and said: "I, am old and barren woman?"
data.30: They said: "Thus said your Lord. He is indeed all-wise and all-knowing."
data.31: He said: "What is then your business, O messengers?"
data.32: They said: "We have been sent to a wicked people
data.33: So as to let loose clods of clay on them
data.34: Marked by your Lord for those who waste their substance."
data.35: So We evacuated everyone who was a believer there,
data.36: But did not find more than a single family of believers.
data.37: We left a sign in this for those who fear the grievous punishment,
data.38: As (there was) in Moses when We sent him to the Pharaoh with clear authority.
data.39: But he turned to his counsellors, and said: "He is a magician or lunatic."
data.40: So We seized him and his armies, and threw them into the sea, for he was worthy of blame.
data.41: In ´Ad (also is a sign), when We sent a blasting wind against them,
data.42: Which turned everything it touched to ashes.
data.43: And in Thamud, when We said to them: "Enjoy yourselves for a while;"
data.44: But they disobeyed the command of their Lord; so they were destroyed by a thunderbolt, and they could only gape,
data.45: And neither stand up nor defend themselves.
data.46: (So had We destroyed) the people of Noah before them: They were surely a sinful people.
data.47: We built the heavens by Our authority; and We are the Lord of power and expanse.
data.48: We spread the earth a carpet; what comfort We provide!
data.49: And We created pairs of everything that you may contemplate.
data.50: So turn to God. I give you a clear warning from Him.
data.51: Do not set up another god with God. I give you a clear warning from Him.
data.52: Even thus no apostle came to those before them but they said: "He is a sorcerer or a mad man."
data.53: Is this the legacy they have passed down from one to the other? In fact, they are a rebellious people.
data.54: Turn away from them. You will not be blamed.
data.55: But go on reminding them, as reminding benefits the believers.
data.56: I have not created the jinns and men but to worship Me.
data.57: I want no sustenance from them nor do I want them to feed Me.
data.58: God is certainly the great provider, Lord of strength and power.
data.59: Those who do wrong will indeed come to the same end as their fellows (of old). So let them not ask Me to hasten (the punishment).
data.60: Alas the woe for those who refuse to believe in the Day which has been promised them.
